name: getNetworkSmUsers
description: List the owners in an SM network with various specified fields and filters

ids.description: Filter users by id(s). Multiple ids can be passed in as comma separated values.

usernames.description: Filter users by username(s). Multiple usernames can be passed in as comma separated values.

emails.description: Filter users by email(s). Multiple emails can be passed in as comma separated values.

scope.description: Specifiy a scope (one of all, none, withAny, withAll, withoutAny, withoutAll) and a set of tags as comma separated values.
